content: **knitted mittens with nordic pattern for children in drops karisma size 1 - 12 years** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern u-085-bn yarn group b ---------------------------------------------------------- **size** 1/2 - 3/4 - 5/6 - 8/10 - 12 years **materials** drops karisma from garnstudio belongs to yarn group b 50-50-100-100-100 g colour no 48 wine red 50-50-50-50-50 g colour no 01 off white **knitting gauge ** 22 stitches in width and 30 row vertically in stocking stitch and nordic pattern = 10 x 10 cm needles drops double pointed needles size 3 and 3 5 mm needle size is only a suggestion if you have too many stitches on 10 cm switch to larger needles if you have too few stitches on 10 cm switch to smaller needles
